metadata.title: CVE-2020-22524 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in FreeImage_Load function in FreeImageLibrary 3.19.0(r1828) allows attackers to cuase a denial of service viacrafted PFM file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22524` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfreeimage3 - 3.17.0+ds1-2ubuntu0.1+esm1
libfreeimageplus3 - 3.17.0+ds1-2ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: freeimage package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.17.0+ds1-2ubuntu0.1+esm1').
